scripts.bootstrap: npm i -g tfx-cli && npm install azure-pipelines-task-lib --save  && npm install @types/node --save-dev && npm install @types/q --save-dev && npm install -g typescript
scripts.clean: if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist && cd .. && if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist
scripts.build: tsc && cd .. && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --share-with {{YOUR_PUBLISHER_NAME}} --rev-version --output-path dist
scripts.publish: tsc && cd .. && tfx extension publish --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --share-with {{YOUR_PUBLISHER_NAME}} --rev-version --output-path dist
